pullRequest.title: Adds a log warning if no sources available
pullRequest.bodyText:
If the maven-release instruction sets a source path, it is not obvious
why and if no sources are packaged. Thus a warning will be logged.
Signed-off-by: Juergen Albert j.albert@data-in-motion.biz

beforeCommit.message:
Adds a log warning if no sources available

If the maven-release instruction sets a source path, it is not obvious
why no sources are packaged. THus a warning will be logged.

Signed-off-by: Juergen Albert <j.albert@data-in-motion.biz>

afterCommit.message:
Adds a log warning if no sources/javadoc/pom is available

Signed-off-by: Juergen Albert <j.albert@data-in-motion.biz>

nodes.bodyText: I think the 2nd arg should just be options.context.getBase(). I don't see why we would want to use a URI here.

I think the 2nd arg should just be options.context.getBase(). I don't see why we would want to use a URI here. We also should not toString() it in case logging does not happen. Leave the toString() call to the logging code.

I think the 2nd arg should just be options.context.getBase(). I don't see why we would want to use a URI here. We also should not toString() it in case logging does not happen. Leave the toString() call to the logging code.
